name: Hangman: Who's going to hang? Free
name_original: Hangman: Who's going to hang? Free
description:
Hangman: Who's going to hang?

Hangman (gallows) is a wonderful game, which you probably remember from your childhood. Earlier you needed a piece of paper or a blackboard- now you can play it on your phone or tablet!
Guess the hidden phrases by selecting letters. Each incorrect letter is one element of the hangman. Do not let him hang!

Categories
Geography - Do you travel a lot? How many countries, cities and geographical names do you know?
Food - Do you like cooking and eating? Maybe you'll find an inspiration. Guess foods and drinks.
Music - Popular music has no secrets from you? Guess the names of the musicians.
Cinema - Movies are your passion? How well do you know the movies, actors and directors? Test yourself!
Animals - Are you an animal-lover or know biology well? This category is for you!

Modes
One Player
Select a category (or all) and guess random phrases. You have one hint for every phrase.
Two players
Play with a friend. Think up a phrase for your opponent. You can draw phrases too, until you find the one that you like. The winner is the one who guesses more phrases.
